lead_paragraph: With FIFA insider Chuck Blazer bringing new corruption allegations, this time against Mohamed bin Hammam of Qatar, FIFA may be crumbling from within.
snippet: With FIFA insider Chuck Blazer bringing new corruption allegations, this time against Mohamed bin Hammam of Qatar, FIFA may be crumbling from within.
